slides.title: iPad Air 11" and 13"
slides.desc: Finally, the new iPad Air has arrived. Empowered by the M2 chip, the new iPad Air comes with Liquid Retina display and a landscape front camera. Did we mention the iPad Air comes in two sizes? 11" and 13". Beautiful than ever; enjoy your every touch with the new iPad Air.

slides.title: iPhone 13 Pro Max
slides.desc: The ultimate iPhone experience. Featuring our Pro camera system with Night mode on all cameras, Cinematic mode for recording videos with shallow depth of field, and the incredible A15 Bionic chip. The Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion is our best yet.

slides.title: MacBook Air 15"
slides.desc: Impressively big. Impossibly thin. The new 15-inch MacBook Air delivers exceptional performance with the M2 chip, up to 18 hours of battery life, and a stunning Liquid Retina display - all in our thinnest and lightest notebook design.

slides.title: Apple Watch Series 9
slides.desc: Our most advanced watch yet. Featuring a brilliant Always-On Retina display, the new S9 chip enables faster performance and innovative new health features like temperature sensing and Crash Detection. Swimproof design with 36-hour battery life.
